pr_title: Changed the Artifact column type and fixed an intermittent error

timeline.message: Started a tenant flow in the newly spawned thread
Changed the artifact column type from blob to longblob in mysql
Changed the Microgateways to Gateways in admin UI Left panel
Changed the Gateways to gateway labels in Publisher UI under Environments

timeline.bodyText: JMS message listener only works in super tenant Space, Therefore this was redundant.
timeline.author: tharindu1st

replies.bodyText: this need to start tenant flow to the tenant which event belongs to
replies.author: tharindu1st

timeline.message:
Removed redundant tenant domain assignment

JMS message listener only works in super tenant Space, checking
for the current tenant domain is not required and supper tenant
can be assigned without any issue.
Added the tenant Domain to the gatewayEvent and used it to start the tenant flow
